title: FK Viləş Masallı
text:
Viləş FK is an <a href="Azerbaijan">Azerbaijan</a>i <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Masally">Masally</a>. The club currently play in the <a href="AFFA%20Amateur%20League">AFFA Amateur League</a>. <a href="Xayal%20Gahramanov">Xayal Gahramanov</a> and <a href="Deviko%20Khinjazov">Deviko Khinjazov</a> are the notable captains.
History.
Founded as "FK Masallı" in 1967, they played in the <a href="AFFA%20Supreme%20League">AFFA Supreme League</a> in 2007–08 after achieving promotion in 2007, but they withdrew from the league and were disestablished at the end of the season having finished in 10th place.
In 2013, the club reformed as FK Viləş Masallı and celebrated a 2–1 win over FC Saaatly in the <a href="AFFA%20Amateur%20League">AFFA Amateur League</a>, in front of a crowd of 1,000. Their home stadium is <a href="Anatoly%20Banishevski%20Stadium">Anatoly Banishevski Stadium</a>. Home colours are white shirts, red shorts. Away colours are either red shirts and blue shorts, or blue shirts with white arms, blue shorts.
Stadium.
The club's home ground is <a href="Anatoly%20Banishevski%20Stadium">Anatoly Banishevski Stadium</a>, a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Masally">Masally</a>, which has a capacity of 7,500.
